title: Enter your weightings
insertText:
You will need to enter weightings for each section.The weightings will determine how important it is to you that the supplier meets that specific criteria.You can set your percenrtages equally or you can weight one criteria more than others.

When you have entered all your weightings on this page, and the following pages, you will get a list of suppliers, in order of who cacn best meet your needs.

You will decide how many suppliers you want to take through to a further competition when you have the list of suplliers.

To continue to the next step your total must be 100%

backJump.title: Return to write and publish your requirements
